GV06keskaupu:13254: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamindrāya svāhā || mukhaṃ devānāmiha yo babhūva yo jānāti vayunānāṃ samīpe |
GV06keskaupu:13255: yasmai hutaṃ devatā bhakṣayanti vāyunetraḥ supraṇītiḥ sunītiḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13256: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamagnaye svāhā || yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ cyāvayanneti vṛkṣān prabhañjanena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13257: rasān gandhān bhāvayanneti devo mātariśvā bhūtabhavyasya kartā |
GV06keskaupu:13258: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ vāyave svāhā || brahmacārī carati brahmacaryamṛcaṃ gāthāṃ brahma paraṃ jigāṃsan |
GV06keskaupu:13259: taṃ vighnā anupariyanti sarve ye antarikṣe ye ca divi śritāsaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13260: taṃ viśo anupariyanti sarvāḥ karmāṇi loke parimohayanti |
GV06keskaupu:13261: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamādityāya svāhā || yo nakṣatraiḥ sarathaṃ yāti devaḥ saṃsiddhena rathena saha saṃvidānaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13263: sa imaṃ dūtaṃ nudatu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśaṃ candrāya svāhā || oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīryaśasvinīḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13264: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamoṣadhībhyaḥ somarājñībhyaḥ svāhā || KKp_ oṣadhayo varuṇarājñīryaśasvinīḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13265: tā imaṃ dūtaṃ nudantu vaṃśapṛṣṭhāt sa me gachatu dviṣato niveśamoṣadhībhyo varuṇarājñībhyaḥ svāhā || aṣṭasthūṇo daśapakṣo yadṛchajo vanaspate |
GV06keskaupu:13266: putrāṃścaiva paśūṃścābhi rakṣa vanaspate || yo vanaspatīnāmupatāpo babhūva yadvā gṛhān ghoramutā jagāma |
GV06keskaupu:13267: tannirjagāma haviṣā ghṛtena śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade || yo vanaspatīnāmupatāpo na āgadyadvā yajñaṃ
GV06keskaupu:13269: sarve tadagne hutamastu bhāgaśaḥ śivān vayamuttaremābhi vājān || tvaṣṭre svāhā iti hutvā || tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ (6.4) ityatrodapātraṃ ninayati ||
GV06keskaupu:13272: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā kapāle'gniṃ kṛtvā udapātraṃ barhirājyaṃ tadādāya śālāyāmupari gūḍhakarma karoti |
GV06keskaupu:13273: śālāyāḥ pṛṣṭhe gatvā tatra kapālāni vā upanidadhāti ā santapanāt |
GV06keskaupu:13274: prāñcamidhmamupasamādhāya parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirityādi ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'asau vai nāma te
GV06keskaupu:13276: 'tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ' iti sūktenājyaṃ juhuyāt |
GV06keskaupu:13283: [atha yatraitat kumbhodadhānaḥ saktudhānī vokhā vāniṅgitā vikasati tatra juhuyāt || KauśS_13,44{136}.1
GV06keskaupu:13285: ṛdhyāsma putraiḥ paśubhiryo no dveṣṭi sa bhidyatām iti || KauśS_13,44{136}.2 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13286: atha kumbhe bhagne udadhāne saktudhānī vokhā vā vikasati tatra śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā 'bhūmirbhūmimagāt' ityṛcājyaṃ juhuyāt ||
GV06keskaupu:13288: 'sadasi sanme bhūyāt' iti mantreṇānyasyāṃ navatarāyāṃ saktudhānyāṃ saktūnāvapet ||
GV06keskaupu:13289: [atha cedodanasya annamasyannaṃ me dehyannaṃ mā mā hiṃsīḥ iti triḥ prāśya || KauśS_13,44{136}.4
GV06keskaupu:13291: atha cedodanasya 'annamasyannaṃ me dehyannaṃ mā mā hiṃsīḥ' iti mantreṇānyasyāṃ prakṣipyānumantrayate
GV06keskaupu:13294: [atha cedudadhānaḥ syāt samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi (10.5.23-24)
GV06keskaupu:13298: atha cedudakakalaśaṃ bhajyate 'samudraṃ vaḥ pra hiṇomi' iti dvābhyāmṛgbhyāmabhimantryānyaṃ kṛtvā udakakalaśaṃ navaṃ kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:13299: tvāhārṣam' (6.87) 'dhruvā dyauḥ' (6.88) iti sūktābhyāmabhimantrya navamudakakalaśaṃ 'hiraṇyavarṇāḥ' iti sūktena udakamabhimantrya kalaśaṃ ninayet |
GV06keskaupu:13302: udakasthālyāṃ bhagnāyāṃ vrīhyādi pūlye udakadhānyāṃ saktudhānyāṃ vā kumbha ukhāgnihotrasthālyādibhāṇḍe bhinne bhagne udakapūrṇakalaśe bhagne śāntiḥ samāptā |
GV06keskaupu:13306: sa khalveteṣu karmasu sarvatra śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā sarvatra cātanānyanuyojayanmātṛnāmāni ca sarvatra varāṃ dhenuṃ kartre dadyāt || KauśS_13,44{136}.10 ||
GV06keskaupu:13311: adbhutamanteṣu yat patitaṃ tad 'agnaya indrāgnibhyām ādityāya uṣasyai svāhā' iti |
GV06keskaupu:13321: yāni deśe kule vāpi adbhutaṃ yatra dṛśyate.
GV06keskaupu:13336: sambhāralakṣaṇe uktaṃ yathāvitānaṃ ca maṇḍapaṃ kārayet ||
GV06keskaupu:13340: barhirlavanaṃ kṛtvā 'grīṣmaste bhūme' ityṛcā upasthāya 'vi mimīṣva' ityṛcā śāntavṛkṣakāṣṭhaṃ mimānamanumantrayate |
GV06keskaupu:13341: ṣaṭśamīṃ prāṅāyatāṃ caturhastān śroṇyāṃ trīn madhye ardhacaturthānagrataḥ
GV06keskaupu:13342: [bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vediṃ sugā vo devāḥ sadanāni santu |
GV06keskaupu:13343: asyāṃ barhiḥ prathatāṃ sādhvantarahiṃsrā ṇaḥ pṛthivī devyastu iti parigṛhṇāti || KauśS_14,1{137}.11
GV06keskaupu:13354: [bṛhaspate pari gṛhāṇa vedim ityuttaravedimopyamānāṃ parigṛhṇāti || KauśS_14,1{137}.15
GV06keskaupu:13359: yasyāścatasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ (12.1.4) iti caturasrāṃ karoti
GV06keskaupu:13360: [devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāmā dade iti lekhanamādāya yatrāgniṃ nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇaṃ karoti || KauśS_14,1{137}.18 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13361: 'devasya tvā' iti mantreṇa lekhanamādāya yatrāgniṃ nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇaṃ karoti
GV06keskaupu:13362: indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu (3.17.4) iti dakṣiṇata ārabhyottarata
GV06keskaupu:13367: [varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtāvṛtā (12.1.52) ityadbhiḥ samprokṣya || KauśS_14,1{137}.23 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13371: [athāgniṃ praṇayet tvāmagne bhṛgavo nayantāmaṅgirasaḥ sadanaṃ śreya ehi |
GV06keskaupu:13372: viśvakarmā pura etu prajānan dhiṣṇyaṃ panthāmanu te diśāma iti
GV06keskaupu:13381: [viśvambharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā (12.1.6) iti lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpya || KauśS_14,1{137}.28
GV06keskaupu:13382: 'viśvambharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā' ityṛcā vedyā lakṣaṇe pratiṣṭhāpanam ||
GV06keskaupu:13389: ayutahome lakṣahome koṭihome grahayajñasamitsu anyatra vrīhiyavatilasamitpuroḍāśādi tantravikalpāt tatra sarvatrāgnipratiṣṭhāpanamanena vidhānena kartavyam |
GV06keskaupu:13391: nidhāsyan bhavati tatra lakṣaṇaṃ karoti' (KauśS 137.18) iti vacanāt |
GV06keskaupu:13398: [agnirbhūmyāmoṣadhīṣu, agnirdiva ā tapati, agnivāsāḥ pṛthivyasitajñūḥ (12.1.19-21) etamidhmaṃ samāhitaṃ juṣāṇaḥ (10.6.35),
GV06keskaupu:13399: asmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantamagne (7.78.2) iti pañcabhiḥ staraṇam ||
GV06keskaupu:13401: kṣatrāṇi dhārayantamagne' iti dvābhyām, etābhiḥ pañcabhirṛgbhiḥ pañcedhma
GV06keskaupu:13413: pradakṣiṇaṃ barhiṣāṃ mūlāni chādayantottarasyā vediśroṇeḥ pūrvottarataḥ saṃsthāpya || KauśS_14,1{137}.36
GV06keskaupu:13416: [ahe daidhiṣavyodatastiṣṭhānyasya sadane sīda yo'smat pākataraḥ iti brahmāsanamanvīkṣate || nirastaḥ parāgvasuḥ saha pāpmanā nirastaḥ so'stu yo'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ iti dakṣiṇā tṛṇaṃ nirasyati || KauśS_14,1{137}.38 ||
GV06keskaupu:13417: tadanvālabhya japati idamahamarvāgvasoḥ sadane sīdāmyṛtasya sadane sīdāmi satyasya sadane sīdāmīṣṭasya sadane sīdāmi pūrtasya sadane sīdāmi māmṛṣa deva barhiḥ svāsasthaṃ tvādhyāsadeyamūrṇamradamanabhiśokam
GV06keskaupu:13419: bṛhaspatirbrahmā brahmasadana āsiṣyate bṛhaspate yajñaṃ gopāya yadududvata unnivataḥ śakeyam pātaṃ mā dyāvāpṛthivī adyāhnaḥ iti dyāvāpṛthivyau samīkṣate ||
GV06keskaupu:13430: purastāddhoma ājyabhāgau ca etat sarvaṃ pākayajñe uktam
GV06keskaupu:13432: yatra kutracit ājyatantreṇa prayojanaṃ tatra sarvatratat pūrvatantram |
GV06keskaupu:13437: yatra bahūni pradhānakarmāṇi ekasmin tatra kriyante tatra antarā antarā abhyātānāni hutvā kriyante |
GV06keskaupu:13439: pākatantre'pi ājyatantrasya pradhānaṃ yadi kriyate ekatantre tadā tasmin tantre pradhānaṃ kṛtvā abhyātānāni hutvā ājyatantrapradhānaṃ kuryāditi |
GV06keskaupu:13442: na darvihome na hastahome na pūrṇahome tantraṃ kuryāt |
GV06keskaupu:13444: yatra ājyaṃ juhoti tatra tantraṃ kuryāt etat sarvatra boddhavyam |
GV06keskaupu:13445: ājyatantraṃ samāptam || caturdaśe'dhyāye prathamā kaṇḍikā || KKp_137 ||
GV06keskaupu:13448: [aṣṭakāyāmaṣṭakāhomāñjuhuyāt || tasyā havīṃṣi dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśa udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanastilaudano yathopapādipaśuḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:13450: ājyatantramājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā paścādagneḥ rohitaṃ carmāstīrya pavitre antardhāya havīṃṣi nirvapati tūṣṇīm |
GV06keskaupu:13451: dhānāḥ karambhaḥ śaṣkulyaḥ puroḍāśa udaudanaḥ kṣīraudanastilaudano yathopapādipaśuḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13452: dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ nirlomaṃ sacarmaṃ sukharaṃ prakṣālyāsādya devasya tvā prabhṛti aṣṭakāyai juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi |
GV06keskaupu:13457: tato'dhiśrayaṇaparyagnikaraṇābhighāraṇodvāsanālaṅkaraṇotpavanaiḥ saṃskṛtya tataḥ ekatra kṛtvā viṃśatipiṇḍān kṛtvā ekaṃ dviguṇaṃ kṛtvābhyātānāni
GV06keskaupu:13459: [darvyā juhuyāt prathamā ha vyuvāsa sā (3.10.1-5) iti pañcabhiḥ || KauśS_14,2{138}.4 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13478: bhūtasya pataye tvā yaje svāhā.' etābhiraṣṭābhiraṣṭau ||
GV06keskaupu:13482: 'ahorātrābhyāṃ tvā yaje svāhā' iti mantreṇa ūnaviṃśīmāhutim ||
GV06keskaupu:13483: [paśāvupapadyamāne dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ nirlomaṃ sacarmaṃ sakhuraṃ prakṣālya || KauśS_14,2{138}.9
GV06keskaupu:13485: yadi paśubāhuṃ sampadyate tadā bāhuṃ 'iḍāyāspadam' ityṛcā 'ā mā puṣṭe ca'
GV06keskaupu:13492: [haviṣāṃ darviṃ pūrayitvā pūrṇā darve (3.10.7) iti sadarvīmekaviṃśīm || KauśS_14,2{138}.12
GV06keskaupu:13493: 'pūrṇā darve' ityavasānābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sadarvīṃ pūrṇāmekaviṃśīṃ juhoti ||
GV06keskaupu:13496: sarvā eva yajñatanūravarundhe sarvā evāsya yajñatanūḥ pitaramupajīvanti ya evamaṣṭakāmupaiti na darvihome na hastahome na pūrṇahome tantraṃ kriyetetyeke ||
GV06keskaupu:13504: aṣṭakāyāṃ kriyetetīṣuphālimāṭharau || caturdaśe'dhyāye dvitīyā kaṇḍikā || KKp_138 ||
GV06keskaupu:13508: śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā proṣṭhapadyāṃ vā abhijiti nakṣatre śiṣyānupanīya ācāryasamīpa āgacchanti
GV06keskaupu:13509: [dadhisaktūn pālāśaṃ daṇḍamahate vasane śuddhamājyaṃ śāntā oṣadhīrnavamudakumbham || KauśS_14,3{139}.2
GV06keskaupu:13511: parisamuhya paryukṣya paristīrya barhirudapātramupasādya paricaraṇenājyaṃ paricarya || KauśS_14,3{139}.4
GV06keskaupu:13515: śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā tato'bhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādagnerdadhisaktūn
GV06keskaupu:13535: 'asmin vasu vasavo dhārayantu' (1.9), 'viśve devā vasavaḥ' (1.30) 'ā yātu
GV06keskaupu:13540: indrasya prathamo rathaḥ (10.4), yaste sarpo vṛścikastṛṣṭadaṃśmā
GV06keskaupu:13541: (12.1.46), namaste astu vidyute (1.13), āre'sāvasmadastu (1.26), yaste pṛthu stanayitnuḥ (7.11) iti saṃsthāpya homān || KauśS_14,3{139}.8 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13542: 'mā no devā ahirvadhīt' 'arasasya śarkoṭasya', 'indrasya prathamo rathaḥ',
GV06keskaupu:13550: sruvapratiṣṭhāpanāntaṃ kṛtvā dadhisaktūn prāśya upādhyāyasahitāḥ śiṣyāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13554: ityekāṃ triṣaptīyaṃ ca paccho vācayet || KauśS_14,3{139}.10 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13555: atha 'avyasaśca' iti japitvā sāvitrīṃ 'brahma jajñānam' ityekāṃ japitvā 'ye triṣaptāḥ' (1.1) iti sūktaṃ pādaṃ pādaṃ vācayati upādhyāyaḥ śiṣyān ||
GV06keskaupu:13559: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate ||
GV06keskaupu:13562: [sa khalvetaṃ pakṣamapakṣīyamāṇaḥ pakṣamanadhīyāna upaśrāmyetā darśāt || KauśS_14,3{139}.13
GV06keskaupu:13566: [viśve devāḥ (1.30), ahaṃ rudrebhiḥ (4.30), siṃhe vyāghre (6.38), yaśo haviḥ (6.39), yaśasaṃ mendraḥ (6.58) girāvaragarāṭeṣu (6.69),
GV06keskaupu:13567: yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane (9.1.11), yacca varco akṣeṣu, yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam (14.1.35, 36) svāhā ityagnau hutvā || KauśS_14,3{139}.15 ||
GV06keskaupu:13571: 'yacca varco akṣeṣu' 'yena mahānaghnyā jaghanaṃ' ityetena gaṇenājyaṃ juhvan raseṣu sampātānānayati prathamaṃ madhusahiteṣu tato madhuvarjiteṣu
GV06keskaupu:13576: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate ||
GV06keskaupu:13583: tṛtīyasyāḥ prātaḥ samāsaṃ sandiśya yasmāt kośāt (19.72.1)
GV06keskaupu:13585: yasmāt kośādudabharāma vedaṃ tasminnantarava dadhma enam |
GV06keskaupu:13586: adhītamiṣṭaṃ brahmaṇo vīryeṇa tena mā devāstapasāvateha iti ||
GV06keskaupu:13587: yoyo bhogaḥ kartavyo bhavati tantaṃ kurvate ||
GV06keskaupu:13589: ye parimokṣaṃ kāmayante te parimucyante || KauśS_14,3{139}.28 ||
GV06keskaupu:13590: chandasārṣadevatāviniyogo kārayitvā visargaḥ || caturdaśe'dhyāye tṛtīyā kaṇḍikā || KKp_139
GV06keskaupu:13595: bhādrapade śuklapakṣe'śvayuje vā māse indramahaḥ kāryaḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13597: sambhṛteṣu sambhāreṣu brahmā rājā cobhau snātāvahatavasanau surabhiṇau vratavantau karmaṇyāvupavasataḥ uttarataḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:13600: śvo bhūte abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā 'śaṃ no devīḥ' (1.6.1) ityṛcaḥ tribhiḥ pādaistrirācamanam 'śaṃ no devīḥ' ityardharcena ekamācamanam |
GV06keskaupu:13606: 'arvāñcamindram' ityekā, 'trātāramindram' ityekā 'indraḥ sutrāmā' ityekā etābhirājyaṃ juhuyāt
GV06keskaupu:13608: ā tvāhārṣam (6.87) dhruvā dyauḥ (6.88) viśastvā sarvā vāñchantu
GV06keskaupu:13611: tataḥ 'ā tvāhārṣam' 'dhruvā dyauḥ' iti sūktābhyāṃ 'viśastvā sarvā
GV06keskaupu:13614: | mahatkāṣṭhaṃ citritaṃ saśiraṃ sadhvajaṃ vastraparihitaṃ dīrghaṃ
GV06keskaupu:13621: tataḥ abhibhūryajñaḥ (6.97-99) ityetaistribhiḥ sūktairanvārabdhe rājani pūrṇahomaṃ juhuyāt tato'bhyātānādyuttaratantram |
GV06keskaupu:13627: ye rājño bhṛtyāḥ syuḥ sarve dīkṣitā brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:13634: tataḥ rājā brahmā ca trikālaṃ 'abhibhūryajñaḥ' ityupatiṣṭhate |
GV06keskaupu:13637: [indra kṣatram (7.84.2) iti haviṣo hutvā brāhmaṇān paricareyuḥ || KauśS_14,4{140}.17 ||
GV06keskaupu:13640: tataḥ pañcame divase 'indrakṣatram' ityṛcā pākayajñavidhānena haviṣo hutvā saṃsthitahomaṃ vihitaṃ ca saṃsthāpya tata indraṃ gṛhītvā avabhṛthāya
GV06keskaupu:13644: nadyāṃ gatvā indraṃ tatra saṃsthāpya tata apāṃ sūktaiḥ snātvā pradakṣiṇamāvṛtyāpa upaspṛśyānavekṣamāṇāḥ pratyudāvrajanti ||
GV06keskaupu:13647: [śvaḥ śvo'sya rāṣṭraṃ jyāyo bhavatyeko'syāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā bhavati na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda yaścaivaṃ vidvānindramaheṇa carati || KauśS_14,4{140}.22 ||]
GV06keskaupu:13648: indramahaḥ prativarṣaṃ yo rājā karoti tasya phalaṃ bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:13651: na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda ||
GV06keskaupu:13660: pauṣyāṃ vyatītāyāṃ yaḥ punaḥ paṭhet kalpādhyayanaṃ kuryāt ||
GV06keskaupu:13665: ācāryāstamite vā yeṣāṃ ca mānuṣī yoniḥ || KauśS_14,5{141}.10 ||
GV06keskaupu:13667: sarvaṃ ca śrāddhikaṃ dravyamadaśāhavyapetaṃ pratigṛhyānadhyāyaḥ || KauśS_14,5{141}.12 ||
GV06keskaupu:13676: sūtake śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā śeṣaṃ pratigṛhīte nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13718: ācārye daśarātraṃ syāt sarveṣu ca svayoniṣu || KauśS_14,5{141}.27 ||
GV06keskaupu:13721: mṛteṣu svayonimātrā gotriṇaḥ sūtake yasya sūtakaṃ sa daśarātraṃ nādhīyīta
GV06keskaupu:13724: atha śiṣyaṃ sahādhyāyinamapradhānaguruṃ copasannamahorātraṃ varjayet || KauśS_14,5{141}.30
GV06keskaupu:13727: apradhānasevakamannādyaṃ vā caturṣu vedeṣu ye upādhyāyāsteṣāṃ mṛte ekarātraṃ nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13728: tathā brahmacāriṇaṃ ca rājānaṃ ca nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13729: anṛtau varṣe garjite vidyutkṛte ekarātraṃ nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13736: ṛtāvūrdhvaṃ prātarāśādyastu kaścidanadhyāyaḥ sandhyāṃ prāpnoti paścimām ||
GV06keskaupu:13738: niśi nigadāyāṃ ca vidyuti śiṣṭaṃ nādhīyīta || KauśS_14,5{141}.36
GV06keskaupu:13740: atha tāvatkālaṃ bhuktvā pradoṣa ubhe sandhye || KauśS_14,5{141}.37 ||
GV06keskaupu:13743: durgandhe śūdrasaṃśrāve paiṅge śabde bhaye rute |
GV06keskaupu:13745: aniktena ca vāsasā caritaṃ yena maithunam |
GV06keskaupu:13748: sarveṇāpararātreṇa viramya pratyārambho na vidyate || KauśS_14,5{141}.41
GV06keskaupu:13768: yatra bahavaḥ śūdrā militvā śṛṇvanti tatra nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13769: paiṅgaśabde yatra cāturvedyādiṣu ekarātraṃ militvā śabdaṃ kurvanti tatra nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13772: yena vastreṇa parihitena maithunamācarati tena vastreṇa parihito nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13775: agre guroḥ prasārya pādaṃ śuktikāṃ vā baddhvā nādhīyīta |
GV06keskaupu:13788: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:13790: trirātraṃ divā ūrdhvastiṣṭhet rātrau upaviśedetadeva prāyaścittam |
GV06keskaupu:13792: sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:13797: yathā mīmāṃsāyāḥ prathame'dhyāye vedasya pramāṇamuktam evaṃ saṃhitāvidhāvapi ādau prathamasūtraiḥ pramāṇamuktam |
GV06keskaupu:13814: mantrabrāhmaṇakalpeṣu pariśiṣṭeṣu ca bhāṣyeṣu ca dvādaśalakṣaṇā mīmāṃsā sarvanyāyeṣu yojayet.
GV06keskaupu:13815: tathā ca mahābhāṣye- "kāni punaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni |
GV06keskaupu:13818: lokeṣu ca vedavyākaraṇādvinā śabdo vāśabdo nāsti yataḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13865: cāturvarṇyaṃ cāturāśramaṃ ca rājā vṛṣṭitvā dharmasyeti |
GV06keskaupu:13869: tathā coktaṃ pūrvabrāhmaṇeprajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tadatharvābhavaditi.
GV06keskaupu:13870: kauśiko vatsaśarmā ca tasya putro'tha dārilaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:13882: brahmatvaṃ tu kṛtaṃ teṣāṃ svaśākhāvihitaṃ tathā ||
GV06keskaupu:13884: bahuguṇe cātra vaṃśe guṇākhyānaṃ na śakyate ||
GV06keskaupu:13896: sūtrācca bhāṣyāccārthaṃ tu jagāda tu kalpitam.
GV06keskaupu:13903: tasyāpi śataṃ jñātvā kṛtā paddhatiriyaṃ tadā ||
GV06keskaupu:13904: ātharvaṇā sarveṣāṃ bhavatu svasti pippalādagotraṃ teṣāṃ āmuṣyāyaṇa sañjñitam |
GV06keskaupu:13905: pravaratrayasamākhyātaṃ kāśyapa-asita-devalabrahmādi brāhmaṇā ānandapure puruṣā viśuddhāḥ
GV06keskaupu:13906: sarve ānandapurasamākhyātā ānandapuraviniśrutā ca ānandapuraṃ vadantyanye kalpagrāmaṃ ca paridhiḥ
GV06keskaupu:13908: samudramadhye yathā dvīpaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu pārthivaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:13909: devānāṃ tu yathā svarga pṛthivyāṃ nagaraṃ tathā ||
GV06keskaupu:13924: paurohityaṃ brahmatvaṃ ca rājavidyā tathaiva ca ||
GV06keskaupu:13925: tathā cātharvaṇavede brāhmaṇe ṛtvijāṃ ca vināśāya rājño janapadasya ca.
GV06keskaupu:13927: catuṣpāt sakalo yajña ityādi niṣedhaṃ darśayati |
GV06keskaupu:13928: caturṣvapi vedeṣu atharvavihitaṃ brahmatvaṃ tathā paurohityaṃ ca |
GV06keskaupu:13937: tathā ca brahmāṇḍapurāṇe - atharvāṅgirasaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ rājapurohite
GV06keskaupu:13940: tathā ca matsyapurāṇe - atharvamantrapāṭhakaṃ sarvaśarīrapūrṇayuktaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ purohitam
GV06keskaupu:13946: tathā ca daṇḍanītyāṃ ca kuśalaḥ syāt purohitaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:13950: tathā bhārate - 'paurohityaṃ pautro atharvavidyāṃ śāntiṃ kārayet' iti
GV06keskaupu:13951: | indreṇa bṛhaspatiratharvāṅgirasaṃ suśrāva svargo me'surairgṛhīta iti |
GV06keskaupu:13952: sa śāntikarmādīni jayakarmāṇi kṛtvā punaḥ svargo abhavat ||
GV06keskaupu:13953: tathā bhārate - drupadena sarvakulakṣayārthamatharvāṅgirasau yājopayājau dvau bhrātarau staḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13956: na haviḥ pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ pitaro dvijāḥ.
GV06keskaupu:13965: tathā ca vārāhajyotiṣe - atharvāṅgirasamahāśāntibhiḥ koṭihomāccādbhutānāṃ ca śamanaṃ bhavati
GV06keskaupu:13966: tathāriputrake ca vāyulakṣaṇe khaṇḍakhādye atharvamahāśāntiḥ paṭhitāḥ śamanārthāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:13975: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ bhaṭṭaḥ - śāntipuṣṭyabhicārā ekabrahmartvigāśrayāḥ kriyā atharvavede kriyante
GV06keskaupu:13984: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhe'dhyāye purohitādhikaraṇe ekavacanam atharvavede śrūyate |
GV06keskaupu:13986: tathā purāṇe - brāhmaṇāni dānāni vā'tharvavedavihitāni kārayet ||
GV06keskaupu:13991: tathā vāyupurāṇe - catvāro vedā vyāsena vibhajya hotradhvaryurudgātraṃ brahmatvamiti |
GV06keskaupu:13994: tathā aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu - brahmatvaṃ ca śāntim atharvavede |
GV06keskaupu:13995: tathā aṣṭādaśapurāṇeṣu rājā atharvavedena sarvakarmāṇi kārayet |
GV06keskaupu:13998: tathā brāhmaṇe - 'atharvāṇaśca ha vā āṅgirasaśca' ityādi yajñe śrāddhādi karmasu |
GV06keskaupu:14001: tathā bhārate - bhṛgvaṅgireṇa viśvāmitro rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:14002: tathā bhārate - bhṛguṇā pratardano rājā brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ.
GV06keskaupu:14003: tathāṅgirasena kāśirājasya naṣṭarājyasya putraśāntiṃ kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkte |
GV06keskaupu:14004: indramarutvatīye ākhyāne marutve varte purohitaṃ kṛtvā indrapratimo bhavasyāhave indreṇa tasya vajraṃ prakṣiptam |
GV06keskaupu:14006: tathā bhṛgūṇāṃ śāpena nahuṣo rājā sarpo ajagaro bhavati |
GV06keskaupu:14007: tathā bhārgaveṇa ṛcīkena sukanyāvivāhaṃ kṛtvā aśvinīkumārābhyāṃ vedābhyāsaḥ yuvā kṛtaḥ tena tau devamadhyasthāpitau yajñabhāgaṃ ca prāpitau |
GV06keskaupu:14008: tathā janamejayasya rājñaḥ purohitena bhārgaveṇa śaunakena sarpasatraṃ prārabdham |
GV06keskaupu:14012: tathā rākṣasaśastreṇa bhārgaveṇa vasiṣṭhapautreṇa pārāśareṇa rākṣasā nipātitāḥ |
GV06keskaupu:14014: tathā pūrvabrāhmaṇe - tasmādya eva sarvavit syāt taṃ brahmāṇaṃ
GV06keskaupu:14016: eṣa ha vai vidvān sarvavid brahmā yad bhṛgvaṅgirovit |
GV06keskaupu:14017: ete ha vā asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāra iti.
GV06keskaupu:14018: tathā saṃhitāvidhau - "tatra rājā bhūmipatirvidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇamicchedeṣa ha vai vidvān yad bhṛgvaṅgirovidete ha vā asya sarvasya śamayitāraḥ pālayitāro yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ" (KauśS 94.2-4) iti.
GV06keskaupu:14022: tathā ca nakṣatrakalpe - kariṣyamāṇasaṅgrāmaṃ pratipadyate tena
GV06keskaupu:14024: tathā atharvāṅgiraso brāhmaṇo vā ahorātrayoḥ puṇyāhaṃ pṛcchet |
GV06keskaupu:14028: puṇyāhaṃ bhavati puṇyāha eva kurute prasthāne |
GV06keskaupu:14029: anyatra vā vyāso bhārgavaḥ mārkaṇḍeyo bhārgavo durvāsā bhārgavaḥ śukrabṛhaspatibhṛgvaṅgiraḥ.
GV06keskaupu:14030: tathā yajurvede pratijñā nāma pariśiṣṭam - 'hastiśalyāṃ aśvalakṣaṇaṃ āyudhāyurvedavidyā dātavyāntarikṣabhūmautpātapraśamanaḥ
GV06keskaupu:14032: atha mahābhāṣye prathame pāde śrūyate - ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo
GV06keskaupu:14036: śaṅgā iti catvāro vedā iti vyākhyātam' ||
GV06keskaupu:14037: tathā mahābhāṣye dvitīye pāde vibhāṣā chandasīti sūtre 'śaṃ no
GV06keskaupu:14041: tathā nirukte catvāri śṛṅgā iti vyākhyātam.
GV06keskaupu:14042: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe catvāri śṛṅgā ityṛcā catvāro vedāḥ iti
GV06keskaupu:14044: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ prathamapāde vedādhikaraṇe atharvavedasya śākhādvayamudāhṛtaṃ paippalādaṃ maudakamiti |
GV06keskaupu:14045: akṛtakā nityāḥ pramāṇaṃ vedā iti sthāpitam ||
GV06keskaupu:14046: tathā mīmāṃsāyāṃ dvitīye'dhyāye sarvaśākhādhikaraṇe paippalādaṃ maudakamiti atharvavedasya śākhādvayamudāhṛtya sarvaśākhāpratyayakrame sthāpitam ||
GV06keskaupu:14047: tathā tṛtīye'dhyāye pravargyādhikaraṇe caturṣvapi vedeṣu na prathamayajño nāma yajño'sti caturvedagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
GV06keskaupu:14049: bhāṣyakāreṇa tathā atharvavedādhikaraṇe catvāri śṛṅgeti catvāro hotrakāḥ prativedamiti vyākhyātam.
GV06keskaupu:14054: tathā atharvavede brāhmaṇe - atha ha prajāpatiḥ somena yakṣyamāṇo vedānuvācakaṃ vā hotāraṃ vṛṇīyāt |
GV06keskaupu:14056: ta ūcurṛgvidameva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva yajurvidamadhvaryuṃ sāmavidamudgātāramatharvāṅgirovidaṃ brahmāṇam |
GV06keskaupu:14057: tathā hāsya yajñaścaturṣu lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu caturṣu vedeṣu catasrāsu hotrāsu catuṣpādyajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati |
GV06keskaupu:14064: bhārate sabhāparvaṇi brahmasabhāyāṃ catvāro vai brahmapārśve tiṣṭhanti mūrtimantāḥ ||
GV06keskaupu:14065: pūrvabrāhmaṇe triviṣṭapaṃ tridivaṃ nākamuttamaṃ tametayā trayyā vidyayeti |
GV06keskaupu:14067: mahānto'tharvaṇāmaṅgirasāṃ ca sā gatiratharvaṇāmaṅgirasa ca sā gatiriti
